Reasoning: The paper discusses causal inference and information flow, which are topics that are relevant to several sub-fields within computer science. However, the focus on probabilistic and geometric perspectives, as well as the use of transfer entropy and correlation dimension, suggest that the paper is most likely to belong to the Information Theory (cs.IT), Machine Learning (cs.LG), Signal Processing (cs.SI), Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS), or Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-categories.
